communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arkansas Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Monthly electronic listings of all employees of the Arkansas Executive Branch from January 1, 2000 to December 31, 2012. Specifically, I am seeking electronic listings of all individuals employed within the offices of the Governor and Lieutenant Governor and all state agencies, commissions, and departments for each month from January 1, 2000 to December 31, 2012.

For each month, I’m seeking a spreadsheet, database, or delimited text file(s) — not paper records or a PDF created from data — with the following fields for each employee: 

Business Area Description
Personnel Area
Personnel Area Description
First Name	
[Middle] Initials
Last Name
Employment Percent
Part-time Employee
Employment Status
Gender
Ethnic Origin
Position title
Entry Date
Date of termination
Annual salary
Employee Group

Thank you for your continued time and assistance. I really appreciate it.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sonny Albarado, a citizen of Arkansas, in coordination with Ben Goehring.

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: California State Employees (2010 - 2018)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Hello,

I am requesting monthly copies of all employees who work in the California Department of Corrections and Rehabilitation for each month from January 2010 through December 2018. In particular, I am requesting a single spreadsheet (with different sheets for each month) or a series of spreadsheets for each month with the following variables (where DEPARTMENT NAME == CDCR): 

DEPARTMENT NAME
FACILITY NAME
COUNTY NAME
LAST NAME	
FIRST NAME
INT INDICATOR
CLASSIFICATION TITLE
CLASS TYPE
CEA INDICATOR
TIME BASE
TENURE
SALARY PER
BASE SALARY
ON-LEAVE INDICATOR
UNIQUE IDENTIFIER
SAFETY MEMBER
OASDI
CBID

In addition, please include any lookup tables that may be needed to interpret the data. For example, if departments are listed with codes linked to a separate table, I will be happy to join the records myself, rather than require your staff to do so.

I am comfortable working with large data sets and can receive the records in a variety of formats (.dbf, .csv, .mdb, etc).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Goehring
